page.title: 17FARM SURVEY page 8
page.content: {Lower Langaton. The farm is 135 acres it has 16 pasture fields.It has no fields for growing crops.It has 14 fields for hay or silage.The farmer doesn,t grow any other crops. {Animals} The farm has 80 milking cows. There are 60 dairy replacements aged between 3 months and 2.5 years, and 10 beef bullocks aged 3 months to a year. {Machinery The farm has 3 tractors, a grass mower, hay turners,a buck rake,several trailers,a baler,a dung spreader,a silage block cutter,a fertilizer spreader,sprayer,rotovator,plough bale accumlator,bale loader,yard scraper,link box and a roller.
